body:
Comment 4 by **jeffreydwalter**: 
I understand. What I'm trying to say, is that the attached code in bounded.go is
directly taken from your tutorial here: http://blog.golang.org/pipelines/bounded.go

While I realize that the example is more demonstrating concurrency, it's confusing that
it doesn't actually work. I think it would be really beneficial for new comers (like
me), if that example was fixed.

Thanks again!
